nodes.text: Elamposnia was a planet in the Gordian Reach of the Outer Rim.

Elamposnia was a monastery world reserved for the elect of the Church of the Light, who took vows of chastity and poverty. Recipients of the Light who fell into darkness were sometimes sent to Elamposnia by their communities for penance.
Natives to Elamposnia were called Elamposnians.
